author: James Joyce
text: Dear Budgen: Let me know please how you are, if ill or away. More than a fortnight ago I sent you Nausikaa and a letter. Did you get them. The chapter you may pass on to Sykes with instructions to send back to me registered when read without sending on to others. The U.S.A. Govt burned the whole last issue of Little Review and threatens to suspend license if Ulysses continues. Swedish translation of Portrait arranged. Italian ditto of Exiles comes out next month. J.J.
